ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | 0oval.1 | |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) |
| 2 |  | 0oval.6 | |- Z = ( 0vec ` W ) |
| 3 |  | 0oval.0 | |- O = ( U 0op W ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_0ofval | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec ) -> O = ( X X. { Z } ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_fveq1d | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec ) -> ( O ` A ) = ( ( X X. { Z } ) ` A ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( O ` A ) = ( ( X X. { Z } ) ` A ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( 0vec ` W ) e. _V |
| 8 | 2, 7 | #P_eqeltri | |- Z e. _V |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fvconst2 | |- ( A e. X -> ( ( X X. { Z } ) ` A ) = Z ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_3ad2ant3 | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( X X. { Z } ) ` A ) = Z ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( O ` A ) = Z ) |
